response.overview: The work is a three-part installation consisting of a large-scale HD video projection and a separate video on a monitor placed elsewhere in the room. The video is accompanied by an intermittent soundtrack. The installation is displayed in an open space, and there are a number of thick rescue blankets on the floor for the audience to sit or lie on.  The projection is shown on a large-scale free-standing, vertical tilted screen made of aluminium, filling the available space almost floor-to-ceiling.
response.title: ahead
